content: I'm going to post an issue to the CQL issue tracker for developing a comprehensive test suite. It shouldn't (ha) be a massive job to cover the core functionality of the language
argubly the test suite needs to be tied firmly to the standar
most of this can be done without any reference to external data (which means should be able to run > 1000 tests in < 1 sec
and some test cases for "truncated division" very welcome!
